21 bool PandaJointVelocityContactController::init(hardware_interface::RobotHW* robot_hardware,
22  ros::NodeHandle& node_handle) {
23  setValueTrackers();
24  setPublishers(node_handle);
25  setSignalParsers(node_handle);
26  return setupController(robot_hardware, node_handle);
27 }
28 
29 
30 // Helper functions to clean up the robot setup
31 void PandaJointVelocityContactController::setPublishers( ros::NodeHandle& node_handle){
32  ext_cart_force_pub_x = node_handle.advertise<std_msgs::Float64>("ext_cart_force_x", 1);
33  ext_cart_force_pub_y = node_handle.advertise<std_msgs::Float64>("ext_cart_force_y", 1);
34  ext_cart_force_pub_z = node_handle.advertise<std_msgs::Float64>("ext_cart_force_z", 1);
35 
36 
37  x_dot_pub = node_handle.advertise<std_msgs::Float64>("x_dot", 1);
38  y_dot_pub = node_handle.advertise<std_msgs::Float64>("y_dot", 1);
39  z_dot_pub = node_handle.advertise<std_msgs::Float64>("z_dot", 1);
40 
41  cart_ext_pub1 = node_handle.advertise<std_msgs::Float64>("cart_ext_pub1", 1);
42  cart_ext_pub2 = node_handle.advertise<std_msgs::Float64>("cart_ext_pub2", 1);
43  cart_ext_pub3 = node_handle.advertise<std_msgs::Float64>("cart_ext_pub3", 1);
44  cart_ext_sum = node_handle.advertise<std_msgs::Float64>("cart_ext_sum", 1);
45 
46  external_wrench_pub = node_handle.advertise<std_msgs::Float64MultiArray>("external_wrench", 1);
47  external_signal_pub = node_handle.advertise<std_msgs::Float64MultiArray>("external_signal", 1);
48 
49 }
50 
51 bool PandaJointVelocityContactController::setupController(hardware_interface::RobotHW* robot_hardware, ros::NodeHandle& node_handle){
52 
53  velocity_joint_interface_ = robot_hardware->get<hardware_interface::VelocityJointInterface>();
54  if (velocity_joint_interface_ == nullptr) {
55  ROS_ERROR(
56  "PandaJointVelocityContactController: Error getting velocity joint interface from hardware!");
57  return false;
58  }
59  std::vector<std::string> joint_names;
60  if (!node_handle.getParam("joint_names", joint_names)) {
61  ROS_ERROR("PandaJointVelocityContactController: Could not parse joint names");
62  }
63  if (joint_names.size() != 7) {
64  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("PandaJointVelocityContactController: Wrong number of joint names, got "
65  << joint_names.size() << " instead of 7 names!");
66  return false;
67  }
68  velocity_joint_handles_.resize(7);
69  for (size_t i = 0; i < 7; ++i) {
70  try {
71  velocity_joint_handles_[i] = velocity_joint_interface_->getHandle(joint_names[i]);
72  } catch (const hardware_interface::HardwareInterfaceException& ex) {
73  ROS_ERROR_STREAM(
74  "PandaJointVelocityContactController: Exception getting joint handles: " << ex.what());
75  return false;
76  }
77  }
78 
79  last_time_called = ros::Time::now().toSec();
80 
81  sub_command_ = node_handle.subscribe<std_msgs::Float64MultiArray>("command", 10, &PandaJointVelocityContactController::jointCommandCb, this);
82 
83 
84  auto* model_interface = robot_hardware->get<franka_hw::FrankaModelInterface>();
85  if (model_interface == nullptr) {
86  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("PandaJointVelocityContactController: Error getting model interface from hardware");
87  return false;
88  }
89  try {
90  model_handle_ = std::make_unique<franka_hw::FrankaModelHandle>(
91  model_interface->getHandle("panda_model"));
92  } catch (hardware_interface::HardwareInterfaceException& ex) {
93  ROS_ERROR_STREAM(
94  "PandaJointVelocityContactController: Exception getting model handle from interface: " << ex.what());
95  return false;
96  }
97 
98  auto state_interface = robot_hardware->get<franka_hw::FrankaStateInterface>();
99  if (state_interface == nullptr) {
100  ROS_ERROR("PandaJointVelocityContactController: Could not get state interface from hardware");
101  return false;
102  }
103 
104  try {
105  state_handle_ = std::make_unique<franka_hw::FrankaStateHandle>(
106  state_interface->getHandle("panda_robot"));
107 
108  } catch (const hardware_interface::HardwareInterfaceException& e) {
109  ROS_ERROR_STREAM(
110  "PandaJointVelocityContactController: Exception getting state handle: " << e.what());
111  return false;
112  }
113 
114  return true;
115 
116 }
117 
118 
119 void PandaJointVelocityContactController::setSignalParsers( ros::NodeHandle& node_handle){
120  this->signal_parser_x = zScore(node_handle, "x");
121  this->signal_parser_y = zScore(node_handle, "y");
122  this->signal_parser_z = zScore(node_handle, "z");
123  this->signal_parser_std_dev = zScore(node_handle, "std_dev");
124 }
125 
126 void PandaJointVelocityContactController::setValueTrackers(){
127  for (int i = 0; i < 7; i++)
128  {
129  this->prev_qd[i] = 0.0;
130  }
131  this->loops_without_signal = 0;
132  this->loops_with_signal = 0;
133 }
134 
135 Eigen::MatrixXd PandaJointVelocityContactController::getCartesianVelocity(
136  Eigen::Map<Eigen::Matrix<double, 6, 7>> &jacobian,
137  Eigen::Map<Eigen::Matrix<double, 7, 1>> &q_dot,
138  bool publish_velocity){
139  Eigen::MatrixXd x_dot = jacobian * q_dot;
140  if(publish_velocity){
141 
142  std_msgs::Float64 x_dot_msg;
143  x_dot_msg.data = x_dot(0);
144 
145  std_msgs::Float64 y_dot_msg;
146  y_dot_msg.data = x_dot(1);
147 
148  std_msgs::Float64 z_dot_msg;
149  z_dot_msg.data = x_dot(2);
150 
151  x_dot_pub.publish(x_dot_msg);
152  y_dot_pub.publish(y_dot_msg);
153  z_dot_pub.publish(z_dot_msg);
154  }
155  return x_dot;
156 }
157 
158 void PandaJointVelocityContactController::updateSignalThresholds(Eigen::MatrixXd& x_dot){
159  signal_parser_x.updateThreshold(x_dot(0));
160  signal_parser_y.updateThreshold(x_dot(1));
161  signal_parser_z.updateThreshold(x_dot(2));
162 }
163 
164 Eigen::Map<Eigen::Matrix<double, 7, 1>> PandaJointVelocityContactController::updateJointAcceleration(franka::RobotState &robot_state,
165  std::array<double, 7> &joint_accs,
166  const ros::Duration& period){
167  for (int i = 0; i < 7; i++){
168  joint_accs[i] = (robot_state.dq[i] - prev_qd[i]) / (period.toSec() * 10);
169  prev_qd[i] = robot_state.dq[i];
170  }
171 
172  return Eigen::Map<Eigen::Matrix<double, 7, 1>>(joint_accs.data());
173 }
174 
175  Eigen::MatrixXd PandaJointVelocityContactController::getExternalWrench(
176  Eigen::Map<Eigen::Matrix<double, 6, 7>>& pinv,
177  Eigen::Map<Eigen::Matrix<double, 7, 1>>& tau_measured,
178  Eigen::Map<Eigen::Matrix<double, 7, 1>>& gravity,
179  Eigen::Map<Eigen::Matrix<double, 7, 1>>& coriolis_matrix,
180  Eigen::Map<Eigen::Matrix<double, 7, 7>>& mass_matrix,
181  Eigen::Map<Eigen::Matrix<double, 7, 1>>& ddq,
182  Eigen::Map<Eigen::Matrix<double, 6, 1>>& wrench,
183  bool publish_values){
184 
185  Eigen::VectorXd tau_ext = tau_measured - gravity - tau_ext_initial_;
186  Eigen::MatrixXd ext_cartesian_wrench = (pinv * (tau_measured - gravity - coriolis_matrix - (0.1 * (mass_matrix * ddq)))) - wrench;
187 
188  std_msgs::Float64 F_x_msg;
189  F_x_msg.data = ext_cartesian_wrench(0);
190 
191  std_msgs::Float64 F_y_msg;
192  F_y_msg.data = ext_cartesian_wrench(1);
193 
194  std_msgs::Float64 F_z_msg;
195  F_z_msg.data = ext_cartesian_wrench(2);
196 
197  if(publish_values){
198  ext_cart_force_pub_x.publish(F_x_msg);
199  ext_cart_force_pub_y.publish(F_y_msg);
200  ext_cart_force_pub_z.publish(F_z_msg);
201  }
202  return ext_cartesian_wrench;
203 
204 }
205 
206 void PandaJointVelocityContactController::starting(const ros::Time& /* time */) {
207  elapsed_time_ = ros::Duration(0.0);
208  franka::RobotState robot_state = state_handle_->getRobotState();
209  std::array<double, 7> gravity_array = model_handle_->getGravity();
210  Eigen::Map<Eigen::Matrix<double, 7, 1>> tau_measured(robot_state.tau_J.data());
211  Eigen::Map<Eigen::Matrix<double, 7, 1>> gravity(gravity_array.data());
212  // Bias correction for the current external torque
213  tau_ext_initial_ = tau_measured - gravity;
214 }
215 
216 void PandaJointVelocityContactController::update(const ros::Time& time,
217  const ros::Duration& period) {
218  // Get current Franka::RobotState
219  elapsed_time_ += period;
220  franka::RobotState robot_state = state_handle_->getRobotState();
221 
222  // Get robot dynamics
223  // TODO(peasant98): How can we move this so it's just one function call?
224  std::array<double, 42> jacobian_array = model_handle_->getZeroJacobian(franka::Frame::kEndEffector);
225  std::array<double, 7> gravity_array = model_handle_->getGravity();
226  std::array<double, 49> mass = model_handle_->getMass();
227  std::array<double, 7> coriolis = model_handle_->getCoriolis();
228  std::array<double, 7> joint_accs;
229 
230  Eigen::Map<Eigen::Matrix<double, 6, 7>> jacobian(jacobian_array.data());
231  Eigen::Map<Eigen::Matrix<double, 7, 1>> tau_measured(robot_state.tau_J.data());
232  Eigen::Map<Eigen::Matrix<double, 7, 1>> gravity(gravity_array.data());
233  Eigen::Map<Eigen::Matrix<double, 7, 1>> q_dot(robot_state.dq.data());
234  Eigen::Map<Eigen::Matrix<double, 6, 1>> wrench(robot_state.O_F_ext_hat_K.data());
235  Eigen::Map<Eigen::Matrix<double, 7, 7>> mass_matrix(mass.data());
236  Eigen::Map<Eigen::Matrix<double, 7, 1>> coriolis_matrix(coriolis.data());
237 
238  // get cartesian velocities
239  Eigen::MatrixXd x_dot = getCartesianVelocity(jacobian, q_dot, true);
240  updateSignalThresholds(x_dot);
241 
242  // invert jac transpose
243  Eigen::MatrixXd jacobian_transpose_pinv = jacobian.transpose().completeOrthogonalDecomposition().pseudoInverse();
244  Eigen::Map<Eigen::Matrix<double, 6, 7>> pinv(jacobian_transpose_pinv.data());
245 
246  // Calculate the external wrench
247  Eigen::Map<Eigen::Matrix<double, 7, 1>> ddq = updateJointAcceleration(robot_state, joint_accs, period);
248  Eigen::MatrixXd ext_cartesian_wrench = getExternalWrench(pinv, tau_measured, gravity,
249  coriolis_matrix, mass_matrix,
250  ddq, wrench, true);
251 
252 
253  std::tuple<bool, float> x_signal_ret = signal_parser_x.getSignal(ext_cartesian_wrench(0));
254  std::tuple<bool, float> y_signal_ret = signal_parser_y.getSignal(ext_cartesian_wrench(1));
255  std::tuple<bool, float> z_signal_ret = signal_parser_z.getSignal(ext_cartesian_wrench(2));
256  // std::tuple<bool, float> std_dev_signal_ret = signal_parser_std_dev.getSignal(ext_cartesian_wrench(2));
257 
258  std::vector<double> external_wrench{wrench(0), wrench(1), wrench(2)};
259  std::vector<double> external_signal{std::get<1>(x_signal_ret), std::get<1>(y_signal_ret), std::get<1>(z_signal_ret)};
260 
261  std_msgs::Float64MultiArray external_wrench_msg;
262  std_msgs::Float64MultiArray external_signal_msg;
263 
264  external_wrench_msg.data = external_wrench;
265  external_signal_msg.data = external_signal;
266 
267  external_wrench_pub.publish(external_wrench_msg);
268  external_signal_pub.publish(external_signal_msg);
269 
270  if (std::get<0>(y_signal_ret)){
271  loops_with_signal++;
272  if (loops_with_signal > 10){
273  loops_without_signal = 0;
274  pause_movement = true;
275  }
276 
277  } else{
278  loops_with_signal = 0;
279  }
280 
281  // If there is no command for more than 0.1 sec, set velocity to 0.0
282  if (ros::Time::now().toSec() - last_time_called > 0.05) {
283  for (int i = 0; i < 7; i++) velocity_joint_handles_[i].setCommand(0.0);
284  } else { // If command recieved, send the command to the controller
285  for (int i = 0; i < 7; i++) {
286  // Print out to the terminal just for the 1st joint for debugging.
287  // Order: Commanded Joint Velocity << Acutal Commanded Joint Velocity << Current Joint Velocity
288  // if (i == 0) ROS_INFO_STREAM("Panda_joint" << i+1 << " " << joint_velocities[i] << " " << robot_state.dq_d[i] << " " << robot_state.dq[i]);
289  // Send command
290  velocity_joint_handles_[i].setCommand(joint_velocities[i]);
291  }
292  }
293 }
294 
295 void PandaJointVelocityContactController::stopping(const ros::Time& /*time*/) {
296  // WARNING: DO NOT SEND ZERO VELOCITIES HERE AS IN CASE OF ABORTING DURING MOTION
297  // A JUMP TO ZERO WILL BE COMMANDED PUTTING HIGH LOADS ON THE ROBOT. LET THE DEFAUL`T
298  // BUILT-IN STOPPING BEHAVIOR SLOW DOWN THE ROBOT.
299 }
300 
301 void PandaJointVelocityContactController::jointCommandCb(const std_msgs::Float64MultiArray::ConstPtr& joint_velocity_commands) {
302  if (joint_velocity_commands->data.size() != 7) {
303  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("PandaJointVelocityContactController: Wrong number of joint velocity commands, got "
304  << joint_velocity_commands->data.size() << " instead of 7 commands!");
305  }
306 
307  // Receive Joint Velocity Commands from a topic and save them in joint_velocities.
308  for (int i = 0; i < 7; i++) joint_velocities[i] = joint_velocity_commands->data[i];
309  // Save the time when the last topic was published
310  last_time_called = ros::Time::now().toSec();
311 }
